data.text:
@KarenMPeterson I’ve rewatched Room on Amazon Prime many times
IMO:Tremblay is one of the greatest Oscar snubs of the decade
@JacobKlainberg Room was good. I've never really decided how I feel about Jackie. Probably should revisit at some point.
@KarenMPeterson I LOVED Jackie and Room,and the trailers are some of the best of a film that exceeded my expectations
@JacobKlainberg That happens to me a lot. Probably the best example from 2015 is Jurassic World. I was so excited and then immediately disappointed in the opening scene.

@KarenMPeterson I’ve seen trailers,and the movies ultimately disappointed me,like La La Land and Ready Player One
Jackie and Room are two trailers that I remember so well

@JacobKlainberg I honestly rarely remember trailers. I wouldn't even know where to begin. I did really love the trailers for The Shape of Water last year. And I really liked the trailer for La La Land, even though I didn't end up liking the movie.
